data.title: Gropu I II Prelims History Culture Heritage and Socio Political Movements in Tamil Nadu
data.meta_description: Gropu I II Prelims History Culture Heritage and Socio Political Movements in Tamil Nadu - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a detailed overview of the history, culture, and society of Tamil Nadu during the Sangam period. It discusses the classical Tamil literature as well as epigraphy and archaeology that serve as sources of information. It then describes the three major ruling dynasties of the Cheras, Cholas, and Pandyas, and notes some of the prominent kings from each. It also mentions the minor chieftains of the Ay and Velir communities and discusses symbols of royal authority. In summary, the document outlines the major political and social developments in Tamil Nadu during the Sangam period through an examination of literary and archaeological sources.
data.text: Gropu I II Prelims History Culture Heritage and Socio Political Movements in Tamil Nadu
